segments.text: From my view, the kitchen looks warm and inviting with that window open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is busy drying a plate, her dress and apron fitting the homemaker vibe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sinkâ€”oh, it's overflowing badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring over, drenching everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea, just keeps polishing away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, kids are up to no good with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on a stool that's about to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies while balancing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager, reaching for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's adorable how they're teaming up for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that puddle on the floor could make anyone slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is serene, unaware of the indoor trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
